wikipedia_page.main: Leopold Hartley Grindon (28 March 1818–20 November 1904) was an English educator and botanist, who was a pioneer in the field of adult education. His collection of plants, related botanical drawings and writings formed one of the main assets of the herbarium at Manchester Museum at the time of its foundation in 1860.
